name: FIREWALL BREACHED
description:
Play as a computers anti-virus software as the system is assaulted by malware. An arcade top-down shooter.

Current Features
  • Includes three enemies, Virals, Trojan Horses, and Torrents
  • Score system tracks the time you survived and how many of each type of enemy you destroyed.
  • Music by Kevin Macleod from Incompetech

Royalty Free Music by Kevin Macleod from Incompetech:

"Exit the Premises", "Severe Tire Damage"
Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
